Package com.library.backend.services.operator

Class CreateBookFormService

java.lang.Object
com.library.backend.services.operator.CreateBookFormService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service
public class CreateBookFormService extends Object implements Service
The CreateBookFormService class provides services for creating and managing book lending forms. It includes functionality for retrieving readers, searching for readers, lending books, and lending reading room books.

      Returns:

    • searchReader

      public Collection<Reader> searchReader(String stringToSearch) throws SearchEngineException
      Searches for readers based on the provided search string.
      Parameters:
      stringToSearch - The string used for searching readers.
      Returns:
      A collection of readers matching the search criteria.
      Throws:
      SearchEngineException - If an error occurs during the search.

    • lendBooks

      public void lendBooks(Reader selectedReader, List<Book> bookList) throws ReaderException
      Lends books to the selected reader.
      Parameters:
      selectedReader - The reader to whom the books are lent.
      bookList - The list of books to be lent.
      Throws:
      ReaderException - If an error occurs during the lending process.

    • lendReadingRoomBooks

      public void lendReadingRoomBooks(Reader selectedReader, List<Book> bookList) throws ReaderException
      Lends reading room books to the selected reader.
      Parameters:
      selectedReader - The reader to whom the reading room books are lent.
      bookList - The list of reading room books to be lent.
      Throws:
      ReaderException - If an error occurs during the lending process.
